title: Bloomberg Markets: Lester Says Avoid Retirement Assumptions

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Anne Lester Portfolio Manager and Head of Retirement Solutions JP Morgan Asset Management Discussing why “No One is Average" in retirement.
